title: Opera 1987 DVDRiP.XViD-HoRRoRFReaKK
description:
A young opera singer (Betty) gets her big chance when the previous star of a production of Verdi's Macbeth is run over by a car. Convinced the opera is bad luck she accepts, and becomes the target (in Argento's unmistakable style) of a psychopath - a man she has been dreaming of since childhood.

aka Terror at the Opera
Genre:  Horror, Mystery, Thriller 
Release Date:  19 December 1987 (Italy)   
Director:   Dario Argento (screenplay, story)
Writer:  Lamberto Bava (story), Massimo De Rita (screenplay)
Stars:  Cristina Marsillach, Ian Charleson, Urbano Barberini
Production Co:    ADC Films, Cecchi Gori Group Tiger Cinematografica, RAI Radiotelevisione Italiana
Country:  Italy
Language:  Italian
Runtime:  107 min, 88 min (edited) 
Color:  Color (Technicolor)
Aspect Ratio:  2.35 : 1
